abstract: Scene at Foley's Pub and Restaurant on West 33rd Street in Manhattan described as Mets fans dine.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday night, four Mets fans huddled together at Foley’s New York Pub and Restaurant, which is a veritable museum of memorabilia of the sport.

headline.main: Mets Fans’ Belief Takes Wing at a Midtown Baseball Bar
headline.print_headline: Where Mets Fans Take Wing. And Wings.

snippet: On Tuesday night, four Mets fans huddled together at Foley’s New York Pub and Restaurant, which is a veritable museum of memorabilia of the sport.
